page.title: 09BROWNIES AND GUIDES
page.content: The 1st Okehampton Brownie Pack has 24 brownies in four sixes which are Elves, Imps, Sprites and Pixies. The 1st Okehampton Guide Company has 30 guides in six patrols which are Kingfisher, Bluetits, Robins, Thrush, Chaffinch and Swallow. In May 1984, the new Guide H.Q. was opened by the Mayoress, Mrs B. Savage. The brownies and guides are now enjoying the freedom of their own premises. 1985 celebrates 75 years of guiding. The pack and company have joined in various events to celebrate the year. In September, a big fun day is being held at Okehampton College for the guides and brownies of the divison. On June 26 the district met at the Taw Green camp-site to collect their 'lights' from the candle lit in London by H.R.H. Princess Margaret to remind them of their guiding light.
